entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.2°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 100.6 kPa

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
